title: Fresh Step Clumping Cat Litter with Febreze Gain Scent, Long Lasting Odor Control Kitty Litter with Activated Charcoal, Low Dust Formula, 14 lb
description: Fresh Step Cat Litter with Febreze guarantees 10 days of odor control and is available in the Gain Original scent that you love in a 99.9% dust-free formula. This clumping cat litter with Ammonia Block Technology uses the power of Febreze to block litter box odors. Made with a cat-friendly formula, this 99.9% dust-free formula helps keep surfaces cleaner and air clearer with your cats health and happiness in mind. A paw-activated Gain Original fragrance is released every time your cat uses the litter box, providing fresh scent as needed for your home. The high quality, ClumpLock technology quickly absorbs liquids while trapping odors on contact to form tight clumps and makes scooping fast and easy. Keep your cats paws and floors purrfectly clean and leave your entire home smelling Febreze fresh with the scent of Gain. Certain trademarks used under license from Procter & Gamble Company or its affiliates.
